sourceDesc.p: Dataset converted from Mysql dump from DBOE@ema digitization of original questionnaires. "kurzFrage" have been deleted.

prefixDef.p: Private URIs using the concept: prefix are pointers to person elements in the dboe-concept-features-fs-lod-tei.xml file. For example, concept:Rot dereferences to dboe-concept-features-fs-lod-tei.xml#Rot.

Private URIs using the targetForm: prefix are pointers to f elements in the lemma_wortat-tei-fs.xml file. Prefix should be used where question being annotated is specifically asking for forms which have given structural property (e.g. Compound, prefix, etc.) or grammatical property (e.g. Adj., Verb., etc.) These will mostly come from ISOcat features (except where missing). For example, targetForm:Compound dereferences to lemma_wortat-tei-fs.xml#Compound.
